name: Vale Tudo MMA Fighting Arena
description:
Ever dreamed to become famous pro fighter in different martial arts and disciplines? Here’s your chance! Rush into this ultimate contest between the most powerful warriors from all over the world! Today your station is hot Brazil and fantastic martial art – Vale Tudo! Combine all your super strikes from the all well-known fighting styles and win the Champion’s belt of Vale Tudo MMA Fighting Arena game!

Take a part in the fighting tournament to beat all your opponents and become the best warrior here! Try to use this wonderful combination of such martial arts as Taekwondo, Judo, Karate, MuayThai, Kung Fu, Boxing, MMA - Vale Tudo! Become a real Brazilian martial artist, win the tournament and just have fun!

Prove your mastery over Brazilian martial arts! Your enemies use different fighting styles including Karate, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, Boxing and other, so do your best to overcome all of them with the power of this combined martial art! Level up your fighting skills with each level, earn points and buy new power attacks – punches, kicks, strikes and even energy blasts! Play Vale Tudo MMA Fighting Arena and have fun!

Earn points for each successfully defeated rival and upgrade your power, speed, and accuracy! Survive on the ring leaving your opponent no chance to stay alive! Check various game modes – training mode, survival mode, contest mode and vs. mode and do your best in each!

Vale Tudo MMA Fighting Arena features:
• Fantastic Brazilian fighting championship action game
• Chance to customize your warrior’s skills as you want
• Wide range of cool strikes, punches and fighting styles
• Check four different game modes: contest, survival, training and vs
• Face many powerful enemies and revenge

It’s time to face and beat your opponents up! Become the strongest fighter on the earth with Vale Tudo MMA Fighting Arena game!
